lead_paragraph: Chris Bosh and Paul George had a quick conversation during one stoppage in play, both taking a moment to remember some of those epic Miami-Indiana playoff matchups of a few years ago.

headline.print_headline: Heat Rally From 18 Down, Top Pacers 103-100 in OT
headline.main: Heat Rally From 18 Down, Top Pacers 103-100 in OT

snippet: Chris Bosh and Paul George had a quick conversation during one stoppage in play, both taking a moment to remember some of those epic Miami-Indiana playoff matchups of a few years ago....
